xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module containing functions for common mathematical operations.
Calculates the absolute value (distance from zero) of a value or expression
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $x The value to return the absolute value of
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:double : the absolute value (distance from zero) of a value or expression

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the arc cosine of an angle, in the range of 0.0 through pi.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:acos' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the arc sine of an angle, in the range of -pi/2 through pi/2.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:asin' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the arc tangent of an angle, in the range of -pi/2 through pi/2.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:atan' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the smallest (closest to negative infinity) value that is not less than the argument and is equal to a mathematical integer.
Returns the trigonometric cosine of an angle.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:cos' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Calculates e (the Euler Constant) raised to the power of a value or expression
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:double : e (the Euler Constant) raised to the power of a value or expression
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:exp' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the largest (closest to positive infinity) value that is not greater than the argument and is equal to a mathematical integer.
Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:log' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the double value that is closest to a integer.
Returns the trigonometric sine of an angle.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:sin' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the correctly rounded positive square root of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:sqrt' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the tangent of the number passed as an argument in radians.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:tan' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts angle in radians to degrees.
Converts angle in degrees to radians.
Returns base of the natural logarithms, e.
Returns the value of pi.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:pi' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a value greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: atan2
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: atan2($y as xs:double, $x as xs:double) as xs:double

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the angle theta from the conversion of rectangular coordinates (x, y) to polar coordinates (r, theta).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:double : the theta component of the point (r, theta) in polar coordinates that corresponds to the point (x, y) in Cartesian coordinates.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:atan2' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: power
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: power($value as xs:double, $power as xs:double) as xs:double

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the value of $value raised to the power of $power.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $power The power to raise the value to
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:deprecated: Moved to the module: http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/math, you should now use 'null:pow' instead! This function could be removed in the next major release version.
